content: becky the monster doll crochet pattern consists of 17 pages of detailed crochet description 70 step-by-steps photos the finished figure is approx 30 cm/11 8 inch long in case of using the materials listed skill level medium the pattern is written in english using us crochet terms & convention if you have any questions write to me and i will answer you _______________________________ materials needed yarn yarnart jeans 55% cotton/45% pac 50 g-160 m/174 yds cream №03 for body black №53 for legs graphite №28 for skirt and belt maroon №66 for cardigan kamteks fancy yarn «lotos travka stretch» 70% acrylic 2% lycra 28% polyamid 50 g-80 m black №003 for hairstyle stuffing material - fiberfill crochet hook appropriate for your yarn i used «tulip» 1 5 mm us 8 about 25 centimeters of hard electrical wire gauge 14 us or 1 5 mm eu for wireframe adhesive tape long eye needle for sewing pieces needle to embroidery pins scissors black and maroon embroidery thread 2 buttons of black color for eyes 15 mm/24l heart shaped button of black color 5 mm for nose metal skull shaped button 15 mm for belt plastic skull shaped button 30 mm for hairstyle dry pastels of black color
